Why is there no setter for size?
The size doesn't change.
Except for LargeCraftAmmoBin?
No. That doesn't change either.

Why even keep these, or at least not deprecate them?
Just temporary cause you don't want to make the change now to remove them? Or is it because they is no setter for size?

I considered that but in the context of a LargeCraftAmmoBin I think the getCapacity() alias is more intuitive. I deprecated Mounted::getCapacity because the concept of capacity doesn't make sense for Mounted in every context.
